song_lyrics: Yogī dyo darshan amne, sukh shānti maḷe manne,
Nā tāp naḍe tanne, ame nā bhulīe tamne...
Yogī je kare te sāru kare, evo nischay jene thashe,
Paḷ paḷ Yogījīne samre, enī naukā nakkī tare... Yogī 1
Tame shuddh bano manthī, nā garv karo tanthī,
Enī sevā karo manthī, Yogī dūr nathī tamthī... Yogī 2
title: Yogī dyo darshan amne sukh shānti maḷe manne

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-995: unknown

Category: Yogiji Maharajna Pad
